description:
Tiny feet? Sasquatch-size flippers? The Stamp come in two sizes to suit a range of riders. Small is ideal for riders with men's shoe sizes 5 to 10, while the Large suits 10 and up. But you can ride what feels right, and take to your fat bike with winter boots and big platforms.

  • Body is forged 6061-T6 aluminum
  • Spindle is chromoly
  • Inner and outer glide bearings perform in adverse conditions
  • Includes 10 adjustable pins per side
  • Concave 2mm platform for optimal shoe/pedal interface
  • Small is 10 x 10cm. Large is 11.4 x 11.1cm
name: Crankbrothers Stamp 7 Pedals
